title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 126.2 - Compensation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 126.2 - Compensation

State Regulations

Each part-time judge or justice of a city, town or village court who is temporarily assigned to a town or village court
pursuant to section
106
(2)
of the Uniform Justice Court Act shall
receive compensation as set forth in section
126.1
of this Part if the
temporary assignment is the result of the death, disability or other incapacity
of a justice in the receiving court, or any vacancy in that
office. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
126.2

Amended

New

York State Register October 25, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 43, eff. 10/1/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
